LanguageData.TM_Artifact_ClassExtraction.label: Shard of Spirit Extraction
LanguageData.TM_Artifact_ClassExtraction.description:
This mysterious shard is capable of extracting the martial or arcane talents of a pawn and converting it to essence. The shard is destroyed after use.
*Note: this item completely removes a pawn's class and any associated abilities and skills. The pawn may learn another class following a spirit extraction.
LanguageData.TM_MagicArtifact_MightEssence.label: Essence of Might
LanguageData.TM_MagicArtifact_MightEssence.descriptio: The essence of raw, martial skill. Absorbing the essence grants martial experience.
LanguageData.TM_MagicArtifact_MagicEssence.label: Essence of Magic
LanguageData.TM_MagicArtifact_MagicEssence.descriptio: The essence of raw, magical skill. Absorbing the essence grants arcane experience.
LanguageData.MagicArtifact_RerollSpiritBond.label: Scroll of Spirit Binding
LanguageData.MagicArtifact_RerollSpiritBond.descripti: This scroll may be used to change the shaman's spirit animal. The new bond will randomly select a new spirit type to bond.
